metadata.Description: The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.

level 1.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.
Energy efficiency employs energy audits to identify energy-saving opportunities and optimize energy use.
Energy efficiency collaborates with industries to develop and implement energy-saving measures and technologies.
Energy efficiency supports the integration of renewable energy sources into the energy system to improve overall energy efficiency.
Energy efficiency administers energy efficiency programs to promote energy-saving behaviors and technologies.
Energy efficiency measures energy performance to assess the effectiveness of energy-saving initiatives.
Energy efficiency aligns with the Sustainable Development Goals by contributing to the goal of affordable and clean energy for all.
Energy efficiency is an instance of energy conservation, which aims to reduce energy consumption and waste.

level 2.Subject: energy storage
level 2.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 2.Subject: energy storage
level 2.Description: Energy storage employs battery technologies to store and release energy efficiently, enabling the integration of renewable energy sources into the grid.

level 2.Subject: energy markets
level 2.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 2.Subject: energy markets
level 2.Description: Energy markets collaborate with government agencies to develop and implement policies and regulations that promote a sustainable and efficient energy sector.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 2.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 2.Description: Renewable energy certificates provide funding for Clean Energy Research to support the development of innovative renewable energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency

level 3.Subject: smart metering technologies
level 3.Description: Smart metering technologies implement the Energy Efficiency Policy by providing real-time data on energy consumption.

level 3.Subject: energy tax incentives
level 3.Description: Energy tax incentives are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the adoption of energy-saving practices.

level 3.Subject: energy storage
level 3.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy certificates
